text: The 2015 Men's NORCECA Volleyball Champions Cup was the first edition of the tournament, and was held in Detroit, United States from 21 to 23 May 2015. The top two teams qualified for the 2015 FIVB Volleyball Men's World Cup. Canada won the tournament for the first time in its history. ==Qualification== The hosts United States and the top three ranked teams from the NORCECA Ranking as of 1 January 2015 which had not yet qualified to the 2015 World Cup.
